awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 13 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: Courtroom thriller about a slick, hotshot lawyer who takes the seemingly unwinnable case of a young altar boy accused of murdering an eminent catholic priest.
plot: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.
title: Primal Fear

tomatoes.consensus: A straightforward, entertaining thriller with a crackerjack performance by Edward Norton.
